revision.text: ==Regaining lost Gen 5 berries== Shovel your only copy of a Gen 5 berry by accident? You can use Enigma to mutate another one rather than having to go through the original mutation process. Here is the setup you need to mutate a Petaya if you shovel your only one by accident: *''Note: Don't forget to equip the [[Squirtbottle]], and use [[Farm Items|Surprise Mulch]] as this is a mutation. Purple squares are where mutations can occur.''
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
